attributes.action: Make the Government actually DO something about Global warming, even though it is too late to STOP it, we can Divert it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people believe that this will happen in many years in the future (e.g a century or two) BUT Scientists and geologists have proved that Global warming is happening more quicker than expected. As you my have seen on the news, The Polar ice caps are melting As I am typing this. The sea level is Rising within each coming year, and, as many Diagrams have shown how the Polar ice caps deflect the Suns rays and therefore, the heat does not effect us as much as it should. BUT if the Polar Ice caps are gone, The temperature will Rise dramatically and then England will soon be as hot as Niger, Chad or Egypt. Also the Fresh water into the Ocean will DROP temperatures, and Cause devastation to many Countries, Including England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
